home.aim: We belive AI will change the world
home.desc: Your personal AI assistant, help you manage your life
home.ScheduleManagementDec: Efficiently manages schedules with reminders, task allocation, voice commands, and real-time collaboration, ensuring data security and privacy for business and personal use
home.SecretaryAffairsDec: Manages schedules, sets reminders, organizes tasks, and facilitates real-time collaboration, ensuring efficient and secure secretary services
home.EmotionalCompanionshipDec: Offers emotional support, engages in conversations, provides encouragement, and helps manage stress, acting as a comforting companion

chat.defaultText: Hello, I'm your personal assistant Vivian, how can I help you?

about.OurMissionContent: Our mission is to provide the best AI-powered personal assistant to make your life easier. We strive to deliver the highest quality service and support to help you manage your daily tasks efficiently.
about.CEOskil: Aimny has a lot of experices on AI and Entrepreneurial
